name: CVE-2010-1886
description: Microsoft Windows XP SP2 and SP3, Windows Server 2003 SP2, Windows Vista SP1 and SP2, Windows Server 2008 SP2 and R2, and Windows 7 allow local users to gain privileges by leveraging access to a process with NetworkService credentials, as demonstrated by TAPI Server, SQL Server, and IIS processes, and related to the Windows Service Isolation feature.  NOTE: the vendor states that privilege escalation from NetworkService to LocalSystem does not cross a "security boundary."
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_xp:-:sp3:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:*:sp2:x64:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:*:sp2:itanium:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:r2:*:itanium:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:r2:*:x64:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_2003_server:-:sp2:x64:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:*:sp1:x64:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_7:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:*:*:x32:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_2003_server:*:sp2:itanium:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:*:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:*:*:x64:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_2003_server:*:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_xp:*:sp2:professional:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:*:sp1:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
